reviewText: The DVD played well for the first 15 minutes, then started to stop/start and then at about the 20 minute make quit working at all.  Too bad I have the book and thought I could use this to hit home the important points.  I don't want to comment on the Color Wheel that I bought separately as I would of liked to see a full explanation of it .
I had no idea that there is another volume. Haven't gotten the second yet. It's heavy and should be watched at least twice.
